data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Waikato, New Zealand to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 315,641 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Waikato, New Zealand
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Waikato, New Zealand so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Waikato words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Waikato, New Zealand to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Hindi people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Waikato.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Waikato.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Waikato you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.
